author: Odeinoichus
title: Bart, you get an F!
review:
Set #71009 Edna Krabapple: Bart's teacher joins the number of characters from Springfield in Series 2 that are new and she looks suitably annoyed at her lot in life being stuck perpetually teaching 4th graders.

Edna has a nice looking torso with a green sweater over her shirt, her legs are bare aside from the hips as you attach another cloth skirt around them in a sort of greenish or blue tone, honestly depending on the light it can be either or. Her accessories are episode specific, a picture of Gordie Howe and a pink mug for her coffee. Both very impressive, especially the printed tile as while it does depict a character from the real world it is his Simpsons Universe counterpart. Her head is nicley sculpted as well capturing her likeness and typical bored/disgruntled expression quite well.

Overall Edna is a welcome addition to the Simpsons Minifigures collection and I would definitely recommend her. Her parts are quite nice as well and it's always nice to get printed tiles.
